page.title: 04S.S.CASTLE
page.content: This area consists of a{steep {wooded hillside}which levels out at the top to give an area of fields.Most of these fields are used for{grazing either{sheep}or{cattle.}Two lines of electricity{pylons}cross the square. There is one building in this area and that is an old{wheel house belonging to the{mines.}It is along a track which used to be a railway line and is now very overgrown.It is known as the{S.S Castle}because of the large iron S shaped metal strengtheners on the walls.If you go inside there is a long dark tunnel stretching hundreds of feet deep.It had a wheel which pulled trucks full of{iron ore}from the mine.You can see the large round hole where the big wheel used to be.
